meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cubic.
meanings.sent1: The cubicities of the building's design were evident in its sharp corners and straight lines.
meanings.sent2: The artist's sculpture displayed perfect cubicities, showcasing his skill in creating geometric shapes.
meanings.sent3: The cubicities of the cake were so precise that it looked like a delicious cube waiting to be eaten.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a perfect cube, emphasizing the cubicities of the space and making it feel cozy.
meanings.sent5: The cubicities of the crystal were mesmerizing, reflecting light in all directions.

meanings.sent1: The cubicities of the box were measured to ensure it could hold all the items.
meanings.sent2: The cubicities of the room were calculated to determine how much furniture could fit inside.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the cubicities of his backpack seemed to shrink every time he tried to fit more books in.
meanings.sent4: The cubicities of the pool were so vast that it seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The cubicities of the ice cube were small, but it cooled the drink perfectly.
